title: Vincent D'Onofrio
summary: Vincent Philip D'Onofrio (/dəˈnɒfrioʊ/; born June 30, 1959) is an American actor, director, producer, and screenwriter. He is known for his supporting and leading roles in both film and television. He has been nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award and two Saturn Awards, winning one for his antagonist role in Men in Black and as Wilson Fisk   / Kingpin in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) streaming television series Daredevil (2015–18) [1]
